cw4

Class FileSaveRetrieveImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • cw4.FileSaveRetrieveImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileSaveRetrieve, java.io.Serializable

    public class FileSaveRetrieveImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileSaveRetrieve, java.io.Serializable
    Deals with saving ContactManagerImpl state to a string and or an external text file.
    Since:
    25 February 2015
    Author:
    Oliver Smart <osmart01@dcs.bbk.ac.uk>
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • serialVersionUID

        private static final long serialVersionUID
        Needed for Serializable to throw an error if asked to decoded a previous incompatible version. Need to increment if this class is changed as it is not backwards compatible with its previous version.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • method

        private FileSaveRetrieveMethod method

      • fileName

        private java.lang.String fileName
        name of the file to retrieve-state-from and to save-state-to. The default value "contacts.txt" is that quoted on CourseWork assignment. Set by setFileName(String), Get by getFileName().
